text: Kaadu gidaaray Qeegeh sugey bicseeh massoyseh tu-gactek :usuk namma awkay qayxiixah taniy woo magaalal tani le gidaarak sugte, kaadu ken nammayih maaluy buuleeniih daaniseeni kay gubat sugeeh ken nammayih abba meqe numuh suge, tokkel ku- Rabbi amahat faxem ken nammay yanbeeh baalukaah maqar kee kas baahaanaah sinni maaluy daanat yani yassaaqeenih gide sugam edde faxe amah ku-Rabbik yan nacruuruy keenih abe, kaadu Muusaw anu abba heem inni amrik maabinniyo Yallih amrih abekkal, tamah elle tasbirem kak duude wayte caagiidah add√¢ fakootu kaak iyye
